title: What contributions did Professor Chike Obi make on Fermat's Theorem? - Quora

response.answer_text: Chike Obi was a Nigerian politician and mathematician. In 1997, he claimed to have an elementary proof of Fermat's Last Theorem, which was later shown to be a false proof (like many other similar claims before and after). While Obi definitely was an important national figure for Nigeria (he may have been the first Nigerian to hold a PhD in mathematics), his contributions to Fermat’s Last Theorem are insignificant.
